steps.title: Choose a username that captures e-girl culture.
steps.content: Choose a username that captures e-girl culture. The e-girl subculture is an internet phenomenon that gained popularity in 2020, when people began trying unique makeup styles while stuck in quarantine. Many people still embrace the e-girl aesthetic, especially in communities on TikTok and Discord. Here are some username ideas that capture the e-girl vibe: [1] X Research source Crimson_Cutie Demon_Kitty Dollface Neko_Babe Choco_Gh0st Moonlit_Goddess Psycho Pixie LoveBug Earth_Angel Sapphire.Sprite Mystical_Muse Dewy.Dreams Neon_Nymph Luna_Labyrinth Mystic Maelstrom Hazy_Heart Ivy Illusions Krypton_Kiss Moon_Mystique Lucid_Dreamz Dangerous_Doll Indigo_Storms MeetMeAtTwilight Starry.Sprite Starlet_Striker

steps.content: Use aesthetic emojis and symbols. Some social media sites allow you to include emojis and symbols in your username. This is a great way to make your name stand out. For example, if you like the e-girl styleâ€™s emo influences, consider including aesthetic emojis like ğŸ¥€ğŸ•¸ï¸ğŸ§·. Many websites also have unique symbols and fonts you can copy and paste.

steps.title: Donâ€™t give out personal information.
steps.content: Donâ€™t give out personal information. Itâ€™s probably okay to include your first name in your username, but donâ€™t include any revealing information, like your last name or anything that might give away your location. Donâ€™t use your username as your password, either. The two should be completely different, and your password should be difficult to guess. [16] X Research source
